#summary JGF Roadmap

= JGF - Roadmap =

JGF has not been released for public usage. Here are the steps ahead in its development.

*0.8 beta (first public release)*

  * Finish the console system.
  * Implement startup, settings and configuration services.
  * Implement the network system and architecture.
  * Review and solve the TODO list and TODO code notes when possible.

* Later on *

  * Add missing documentation and review licence notes.
  * Complete Wiki and tutorials.
